note: Moving from the bird place maybe. Into adventure gaming (TTRPG) zines and art, electronic music, boardgames, whisky and tech. Spending time with my daughter. UK

fields.name: TTRPG
fields.value: Mostly collecting, but would like to start playing or DMing in the UK Twickenham area. 5e, Troika, Mothership, IntoTheOdd, OSE, DCC, Ryuutama, Morg Borg, solo, other OSR

fields.name: Boardgames
fields.value: Solo and with my daughter. Currently playing Everdell and Bardsung, plus Button Shy wallet games.

fields.name: Career
fields.value: IT industry analyst. Not saying which so I can keep this persona more personal
